question.title: Java Run Fails in NetBeans ‚Äì Tried Everything, Still Getting run.xml Error
question.body:
Can't Run Java in NetBeans 25 (JDK 21) ‚Äì Constant run.xml Error (Line 111/68) ‚Äì Need Help Before Finals!

I‚Äôm having a persistent issue running even a simple Hello World Java program in Apache NetBeans 25 using JDK 21 (also tried JDK 17). Every time I try to run the project, I get this error:

pgsql
Copy
Edit
BUILD FAILED
C:\\Users\\markm\\AppData\\Local\\NetBeans\\Cache\\25\\executor-snippets\\run.xml:111:
The following error occurred while executing this line:
C:\\Users\\markm\\AppData\\Local\\NetBeans\\Cache\\25\\executor-snippets\\run.xml:68: Java returned: 1

‚úÖ What I‚Äôve Already Tried Reinstalled NetBeans and JDK multiple times

Verified that JAVA_HOME is correctly set to: C:\\Program Files\\Java\\jdk-21

Added the JDK bin folder to my system Path variable

In NetBeans:

Tools ‚Üí Java Platforms ‚Üí Confirmed correct JDK is selected

Right-click project ‚Üí Clean and Build ‚Üí Tried running again

Confirmed the main class is correctly set

Ran NetBeans as Administrator

Deleted .netbeans, .cache, and started with fresh settings

Ensured .class files exist in build/classes

Checked the auto-generated run.xml file, especially around this section:

xml
Copy
Edit
\<java classname="@{classname}" dir="${work.dir}" failonerror="${java.failonerror}" fork="true" jvm="${platform.java}"\>

‚ùì What I Need Help With

Is there some hidden misconfiguration (like system environment variables or NetBeans internal caches) causing this?

Could NetBeans be generating run.xml incorrectly or using the wrong settings?

Has anyone experienced this and found a fix?

üéì Why This Matters

This issue is blocking me from starting my System Proposal, which is our Major Programming project for Finals üò≠. It‚Äôs a huge part of my final grade, and I‚Äôm really eager to start building and contributing to the system now.

Wish me luck and thank you in advance ‚Äî any help, tip, or advice is truly appreciated! üôè
